question:
You borrowed something from your friend, later it got damaged. Write letter to your friend.

In your letter, you should:
apology about the issue
tell how it got damaged
say you are going to fix this issue.
write 150 words
text: How are you buddy? I am writing you to tell you that I unintentionally spoiled your laptop I had borrowed from you last week.

I am extremely sorry mate for technical shutdown of your computer. I know that in the coming week you will be needing your computer, as you have loads of work lined up. I didn't intend to cause this technical glitch, but unfortunately it has happened.

Do you remember I had mentioned about a pen drive I had which was corrupted? Unfortunately, I have two of them with the same design and I assumed that I had plugged in the uncorrupted one. However, I plugged the one which had the virus and it spoilt the entire system.

I do understand that you have a lot of significant data in your computer. Therefore, I have given it for a system reboot so that none of the information will be lost and a hard disc for a backup to be created. Along with that, I have asked my technician to install an anti-virus software to deal with such situations in future.
